The creature grips the surface with its claws, overlooking the sea at sunset. The sun and sky serve as the background, casting a golden light on the creature.
negative_prompt: Wings, birdlike features, text, fishlike features, horse-like head, swimming, flying, underwater, no tail, lion head, aquatic surroundings, water splash effects., water splash effects, lion head., aquatic surroundings.
